name: DENT_TREAT_FIND_HIST_RM
description: This table extracts the dental treatment historical findings.

columns.name: TREATMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the treatment plan record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical instant in the treatment record. Together with TREATMENT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_TPL_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number for one of the multiple findings associated with the treatment and the historical instant from the DENTAL_TPL_HX table

columns.name: TR_FINDINGS_HX_ID
columns.description: stores revision history of findings within a treatment
